title: Apsara
description: This is the story of Triloka-Heaven, Earth and Patala. The lead character is an Apsara- Lata. She was entrusted a mission by Indra, The king of Heaven. The mission was to destroy his enemy, Raja and seize his gold which was three thousand metric tons. Lata successfully draws a foolproof plan but she repeats the same folly her predecessors had done. She falls in love with Raja.
author: Vipin Behari Goyal
